_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Situational awareness (a causal chain) [: Bearing the outer robe, bowl, and robes
Walking, standing, sitting, sleeping, waking, speaking, and keeping silent
Recollection of past lives (a causal seq: Seeing sentient beings passing away and being reborn
Understanding how sentient beings are reborn according to their deeds
Knowledge of the ending of defilements (: Knowledge of the ending of defilements
Understanding suffering, the origin of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering
Understanding defilements, the origin of defilements, the cessation of defilements, and the practice that leads to the cessation of defilements
